title: The Gravedancers -- After Dark Horrorfest 2006
description:
*******************************************************************************
                The Gravedancers -- After Dark Horrorfest 2006
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Movie
More Info............: http://www.horrorfestonline.com/archive/2006/index.html
Video Format.........: Single Layer DVD
Source...............: DVD 16x9
Original Format......: NTSC
Genre................: Horror
Movie Information....: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0435653/

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                   Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
After a drunken night of dancing on graves, a group of friends are haunted by 
three havoc-ninded ghosts bent on revenge.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              DVD Bonus Features
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Commentary with Director Mike Mendez and Composer Joseph Bishara
"A Grave Undertaking" Making-of Featurette with Optional Commentary
"Making the Ghosts" Making-of Featurette
Original Trailer with Optional Commentary
Deleted Scenes with Optional Commentary
Storyboard Galleries
16x9 Widescreen Version
5.1 and 2.0 Dolby Digital Audio
English and Spanish Subtitles
English Closed Captioning
Trailers
